verses.verse: Again there was a day<WH3117> when the sons<WH1121> of God<WH430> came<WH935> to present<WH3320> themselves before the Lord<WH3068>, and Satan<WH7854> came<WH935> also among<WH8432> them to present<WH3320> himself before the Lord<WH3068>.
